name: Benevolent Tech
tagline: High contrast works for small to medium business
description: Benevolent Tech is a boutique development & design agency based in Washington D.C. We've helped companies build cost effective marketing strategy and assets. With a talented team of marketers, designers and engineers — companies call on us to serve as their in-house tech team for marketing campaigns, branding, and product dev. We pride ourselves on being small business and startup friendly.
